page.title: 19LAW AND ORDER CONTINUED
page.content: Our local police have their HQ at Albert Rd.WPC Ratcliffe told us that they work on the beat,on bike,or by car.There are some special police who help at weekends and on special days like the Queen's visit,the Southport Flower Show or Orange Mans Day. Merseyside police employs Juvenile Liaison Officers who are expected to take positive steps to guide young people away from crime and delinquancy.This might include speaking to groups of young people in schools and youth clubs and individuals to ease work in respect of a juvenile offenders. More than 70 police dogs are used in Merseyside for tracking and detaining fleeing criminals,searching for stolen property,tackling dangerous criminals and detaining substances. The police use national computers.
